column1: Uchi////The hotate momo is one of their recent specials. Scallops
column3: peach and pearl onion. Sounds great
column4: right? Not when the dish has clearly been sitting idle for a while and the scallops are cold
column5: rubbery and overcooked. This was the most disappointing thing we ordered
column6: and I've grown pretty accustomed to being disappointed by Houston restaurants.
